summary: Apple iOS and iPadOS contains an incorrect authorization vulnerability that allows a physical attacker to disable USB Restricted Mode on a locked device.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Mitel 6800 Series, 6900 Series, and 6900w Series SIP Phones contain an argument injection vulnerability due to insufficient parameter sanitization during the boot process.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Microsoft Windows Ancillary Function Driver for WinSock contains a heap based buffer overflow vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation, enabling a local attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Microsoft Windows Storage contains a link following vulnerability that could allow for privilege escalation and data deletion.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Trimble Cityworks contains a deserialization vulnerability that could allow remote code execution on an IIS web server.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Sophos XG Firewall contains a buffer overflow vulnerability that allows for remote code execution via the 'HTTP/S bookmark' feature.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: CyberoamOS (CROS) contains a SQL injection vulnerability in the WebAdmin that allows an unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary SQL statements remotely.
remediation_note: Users should discontinue utilization of the product.

summary: Microsoft Outlook contains an improper input validation vulnerability that allows for remote code execution by bypassing the Office Protected View.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Dante Discovery contains a process control vulnerability in mDNSResponder.exe that allows for a DLL sideloading attack.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: 7-Zip contains a protection mechanism failure vulnerability that allows remote attackers to bypass the Mark-of-the-Web security feature to execute arbitrary code.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Linux kernel contains an out of bounds write vulnerability in the UVC driver that could allow for physical escalation of privilege.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Paessler PRTG Network Monitor contains a local file inclusion vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to create users with elevated privileges.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Paessler PRTG Network Monitor contains an OS command injection vulnerability that allows an attacker to execute commands via the web console.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Microsoft .NET Framework contains an information disclosure vulnerability that exposes the ObjRef URI, enabling remote code execution.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Apache OFBiz contains a forced browsing vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to obtain unauthorized access.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Apple products contain a use after free vulnerability that could allow privilege escalation.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: SonicWall SMA1000 Appliances contain a deserialization vulnerability that can enable remote execution of OS commands.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: JQuery contains a persistent cross site scripting vulnerability when processing untrusted input enclosed in HTML tags.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Aviatrix Controllers contain an OS command injection vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V NT Kernel Integration VSP contains a use after free vulnerability that allows a local attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V NT Kernel Integration VSP contains a use after free vulnerability that allows a local attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V NT Kernel Integration VSP contains a heap based buffer overflow vulnerability that allows a local attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Fortinet FortiOS and FortiProxy contain an authentication bypass vulnerability that may allow remote super admin access.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: Qlik Sense contains an HTTP tunneling vulnerability that allows privilege escalation and execution of HTTP requests on the backend server.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

app_and_tech: Privileged Remote Access (PRA) and Remote Support (RS)
summary: BeyondTrust PRA and RS contain an OS command injection vulnerability that can allow an attacker to upload a malicious file.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

app_and_tech: Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and ZTA Gateways
summary: Ivanti Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and ZTA Gateways contain a stack based buffer overflow vulnerability that can lead to unauthenticated remote code execution.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations as set forth in the CISA instructions.

summary: Oracle WebLogic Server contains an unspecified vulnerability exploitable by an unauthenticated attacker via IIOP or T3.
remediation_note: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.

summary: D-Link DIR-853 A1 FW1.20B07 contains a stack based buffer overflow vulnerability via the Password parameter in the SetWanSettings module.
remediation_note: Apply vendor mitigations.
